p.label: Which school year are you interest in? *

input.name: _utf8

p.span: By submitting this form, I expressly consent and authorize ACCEL Schools to contact me at the number(s) provided via text or short message service (SMS) as well as by phone, regarding educational matters. I understand that these calls may be generated using automated technology and that message and data rates may apply, for which I will be solely financially responsible.

div.p: Click tabs and files below to read important updates & access resources for your family.

li.a: i-Ready Remote Learning Packets for Grades K-8
Resources for Families to Keep Students Engaged

div.p: On Monday, April 20th, Governor DeWine extended the closure of all Ohio schools through the end of the school year. The action was taken to contain the spread of the coronavirus (COVID-19). For this reason, our school is currently closed. Please continue to check back for updates.

In accordance with government orders to shelter in place, meal pick-up will be consolidated to twice per week. Beginning the week of April 6th, all five days of food will be available for pick-up during limited serving hours: Tuesdays & Thursdays 9:00am – 11:00am. For more information read this update.
Spectrum is offering FREE internet to students during school closures related to COVID-19. To participate, families can call:
Ohio Department of Health Call Center is open daily from 9:00am-8:00pm:

div.span:
Thank you for choosing Youngstown Academy of
Excellence for your child and allowing us to serve
your family. To begin the enrollment process,
please click below.
